name: Colouring Manor
description:
Colouring Manor is here! What a sweet world!
From doughnuts to Chocolates, from roses to Strawberry, you will never feel bored!
Features:
◆ Hundreds of vegetables levels!
◆ Brand new power-ups and ways to play!
◆ Swap and blast your way through ever expanding new worlds!
◆ Spin the wheel for events, free rewards and new levels!
◆ Free to play and enjoy the puzzles!

Join us, a richly detailed world and addictive match-3 gameplay, Colouring Manor is sure to satisfy!
